A Lifetime of Discarded Purchases

UNFASHIONED

An average fast-fashion consumer buys around 3000 pieces and discards around 70% of them. This project aims to demonstrate the impact of this reality as an accumulation through one's lifetime. Unfashioned is a part of data-visalisation explorations, inspired and based on the lasting affect of human consumption on the planet and her inhabitants.
